𓎛 𓈎 𓂋𓅪|hunger| xhaqur 𐌷𐌿𐌷𐍂𐌿𐍃 ⋍hunger hager ϩⲕⲟ hko ⇔ 'occel ক্ষুধা kkhudha glutton глад hlad ⇔ hold,child
𓎛 𓈎 𓂋 𓅁||hungry man|⋍Hungry grangou הguħ Basque: gose
𓎛 𓈎 𓂋 𓀁 𓀀||hungry man|⋍Hungry Haggart רָעָב 𐎗𐎙𐎁𐎐 rġbn raġhpeîna πεῖνα
𓎛 𓈎 𓂋 𓅪||be hungry, hunger|luqur-vol / ⇔lucke,lungern, liquor, lecker, look aweful /

𓎛 𓈎||Heqat (frog goddess)|Lurch / Herqat / Herscher / Harquack ⇔ Frogger
